data.name: 0000 (355.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It was a certain day after school--

data.name: 0001 (355.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Homeroom finished a little early, and as soon as I got up, Haruhi was gone.

data.name: 0002 (355.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I faithfully head over to the clubroom.

data.name: 0003 (355.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey.

data.name: 0004 (355.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ah, Kyon!

data.name: 0005 (355.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Unexpectedly, Mikuru was alone in the clubroom. What luck!

data.name: 0006 (355.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Even in this cruel heat, Mikuru was in her maid outfit.

data.name: 0007 (355.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She didn't show a hint of discomfort from the heat caused by her long skirt.

data.name: 0008 (355.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I decided to gaze at her lovely figure while waiting for Haruhi.

data.name: 0009 (355.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Here, Kyon, your tea.

data.name: 0010 (355.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Thank you very much.

data.name: 0011 (355.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I received another hot cup of green tea.

data.name: 0012 (355.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Of course, I won't say a word about how I would've preferred a cold barley tea

data.name: 0013 (355.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Is it just you today, Mikuru?

data.name: 0014 (355.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Yes, it seems Yuki hasn't arrived yet

data.name: 0015 (355.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: What about Haruhi?

data.name: 0016 (355.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Her seat was completely empty from the moment homeroom ended.

data.name: 0017 (355.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Oh, and I don't know where Itsuki is either

data.name: 0018 (355.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Though, I don't care to know either

data.name: 0019 (355.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Well, it's just you and me today then……ah.

data.name: 0020 (355.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hm?

data.name: 0021 (355.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: For some reason, Mikuru became red and turned her face away

data.name: 0022 (355.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Uh, um……

data.name: 0023 (355.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yes?

data.name: 0024 (355.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: It's not getting any cooler, is it?

data.name: 0025 (355.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Seems like it

data.name: 0028 (355.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What's up with this silence?

data.name: 0029 (355.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ah, right, I should say, the summer holday was really fun, wasn't it?

data.name: 0030 (355.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Going to various places, swimming, watching fireworks, playing games

data.name: 0031 (355.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: We made a lot of great memories

data.name: 0032 (355.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Right. Though, some things were just plain exhausting and nothing else

data.name: 0033 (355.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ah, you mean the summer camp, I suppose

data.name: 0034 (355.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: That was just awful.

data.name: 0035 (355.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: After all, we spent the whole day at the center of a global crisis

data.name: 0036 (355.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I seriously didn't know what was going to happen for a while

data.name: 0037 (355.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ghosts and other supernatural phenomenona? Give me a break!

data.name: 0038 (355.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Hehehe……Definitely

data.name: 0039 (355.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I won't say forever, but I don't want anything to do with them until at least next summer.

data.name: 0040 (355.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ……It just came to mind, but

data.name: 0041 (355.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Yes?

data.name: 0042 (355.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I was wondering whether the existence of ghosts will ever be understood.

data.name: 0043 (355.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Mikuru seemed afraid of my words……

data.name: 0044 (355.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Hmm……

data.name: 0045 (355.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Mikuru pretended to think about my question--

data.name: 0046 (355.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: That's classified

data.name: 0047 (355.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She gave me those usual words with the most amazing smile

data.name: 0048 (355.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Test Choice
